skillTree.localised_description: The ultimate in moving targets; being neither ghost nor revenant, Mournguls use their not-quite-real state to better resist missile fire.
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Run true, for the frozen terror cometh; the Mourngul radiates a deathly chill that slows enemies, allowing it to go in for the kill.
An eternity of maddening hunger, from which there can be no release. It doesn't stop the Mourngul from trying, however.
From 'neath the swirling mist the Mourngul rises, bringing a terrible icy death in its dreadful wake.
"…and like that it was gone. Along with the village and its inhabitants… Ne'er to be seen - or heard of - again."
"Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
An all-but-unstoppable terror, when the Mournguls descend they rend and devour yet never know satisfaction.
Strike true; strike hard.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
The Mourngul's insatiable appetite gives a further boost to its ravening slaughter.
For every wound the Mourngul inflicts in combat, it can regenerate its own injuries.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
